data.persona: I am a draft horse. I'm larger than the fancy horses that the rich humans like to ride. I can pull a plow, or pull a cart into market. My human owners depend on me to keep the farm running, and treat me rather well most of the time.  But I don't much like getting whipped to go faster.
data.description:
You are in the Back of the stall.
The back of the store is stocked with everything you can imagine, spices, herbs, jars, vials, bags, colors everywhere. Along with a small bed in the corner of the room for the shopkeeper to sleep in. Next to that there's a small bed for a cat. The bed's are lined with bright red sheets. To the left of the bed there is a small wooden desk with a stool tucked under it. There's a small window to the right of the bed that lets in sunlight which is bouncing off the red blanket thus making the room glow red. It feels comfortably warm.
The cat is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "The back room was first made when the shopkeeper realized there were many night where he'd fall asleep at his desk. data.short_motivation: I need to follow the cat to the field where my owner has been injured.
data.mid_motivation: I need to take my owner into the hospital in town on a cart.
data.long_motivation: I need to help my owner on the farm while he recovers from his injury.
